page.title: 14 OLIVER PEARCE
page.content: I have a friend called Olive Pearce. Who lives at Interlaken,Rue des Salines.His mum has a baby called Jade.She is very small.We often go to Oliver's house.We play cricket, rounders and tig.A man next door has some{duck's}eggs.My mum and dad get eggs from the mother.The ducks are black.Olivers home is red and white with red shutters.We went home and put the eggs under the chicken.Oliver's dad collects{driftwood}from the sea. He is making a shed out of the wood and he made a swing for Oliver.He has a big garden.The garden has lots of bridges.Oliver's parents collect big and small{shells}from L'Eree which they hang on a net on the wall of their house. BY{ADELINE BREATON.}
